title: Art Deco Wedding Font
content:
Dear Type Gurus of the World,

I am looking for some advice on Art Deco style font that would be good to use for wedding invitations. The wedding will be held in a great, old theatre that has a sort of Art Deco flair so I want to tie the invitations into the setting. Being that this wedding will not be held in a traditional setting it is not absolutely necessary to follow the traditions of formal or script type or design, but I do still want to keep it classy.

Thank you in advance for your help and insight,

Duncan Robertson
author: duncan

comments.content: Mark Simonson has a nice typeface that can be seen here: [http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/mostra.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010019/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/mostra.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/mostra.html") and he also has this Art Deco inspired Roman face that can be seen here: [http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/goldenbook.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010019/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/goldenbook.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/goldenbook.html")
